plays.text: Goal scored by Tomas Holmstrom assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Dmitri Bykov
Penalty to Marek Malik 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Sean Avery
Goal scored by Trent Klatt assisted by Daniel Sedin and Henrik Sedin
Penalty to Henrik Zetterberg 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Dan Cloutier
Goal scored by Bryan Allen assisted by Markus Naslund and Todd Bertuzzi
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Todd Bertuzzi
Penalty to Dan Cloutier 2 minutes for Hooking Tomas Holmstrom served by Trent Klatt
Penalty to Markus Naslund 2 minutes for Roughing Chris Chelios
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Roughing Markus Naslund
Penalty to Todd Bertuzzi 2 minutes for Roughing Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for Roughing Todd Bertuzzi
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for High Sticking Todd Bertuzzi served by Sean Avery
Goal scored by Sami Salo assisted by Mattias Ohlund and Henrik Sedin
Penalty to Darren McCarty 2 minutes for Charging(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Matt Cooke assisted by Marek Malik and Trevor Letowski
Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Slashing Marek Malik
Penalty to Sean Avery 2 minutes for Roughing Marek Malik
Penalty to Murray Baron 2 minutes for Hooking Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Sean Avery 5 minutes for Fighting Matt Cooke
Penalty to Sean Avery 10 minutes for Misconduct Matt Cooke
Penalty to Sean Avery 10 minutes for Game Misconduct Matt Cooke
Penalty to Sean Avery 2 minutes for Roughing Matt Cooke served by Brett Hull
